channel.title: Obituary on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Obituary on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Right-Wing Activist Charlie Kirk Dead at 31
item.description: Turning Point USA cofounder Charlie Kirk died after he was shot at an event at Utah Valley University on Wednesday.

item.title: Right-Wing Activist Charlie Kirk Dead at 31
item.description: Turning Point USA cofounder Charlie Kirk died after he was shot at an event at Utah Valley University on Wednesday.

item.title: Nobel laureate David Baltimore dead at 87
item.description: Celebrated molecular biologist weathered late ’80s controversy to become Caltech president.

item.title: James Lovell, the steady astronaut who brought Apollo 13 home safely, has died
item.description: Lovell was the first person to fly to the Moon twice.

item.title: Julian LeFay, “the father of The Elder Scrolls,” has died at 59
item.description: LeFay spearheaded Arena and Daggerfall before passing the torch to Todd Howard.
